projects.title: SecureVision-Crime-Recognition-System
projects.description: SecureVision is an AI-based system designed to detect and classify various criminal activities in video footage in real-time. The goal of this project is to enhance public safety by automatically identifying criminal activities in video footage.

projects.title: Video Conferencing Website
projects.description: The Video Conferencing Website Project is a cutting-edge platform designed to facilitate seamless virtual communication and collaboration.

projects.title: Speech Enabled Airline Reservation System
projects.description: The Speech Enabled Airline Reservation System revolutionizes flight booking by integrating advanced speech recognition and synthesis technology.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: Welcome to my portfolio website, featuring my work in full-stack development and machine learning. Here, you can explore my projects, skills, and passion for technology. Let's connect and collaborate on innovative ideas.

projects.title: Chat App
projects.description: ChatNest is a dynamic chat app enabling seamless group and one-on-one conversations. It combines robust messaging features with a user-friendly interface for efficient communication.
